name: Turtle Guard
description:
Juggle controling a sleepy old man and his sentient wheelchair to help turtles in their fierce battle to get to the sea! The eggs are in a pending state until they hatch, so observe the beach closely and look for turtles to save!

Preferably played in local multiplayer!

Control moving the Turtle Guard with 8.4.5.6 and attack with 0.

Control moving the Wheelchair with W,A,S,D and put down Turtle Guard (after he is picked up) with SPACE.

The Turtle Guard has an energy meter that drains overtime. To regain his energy, pick him up with the wheelchair so he can rest up!

Design & Concept Artist: Pandrew

Programming: thaDameer

Art: qrsaart

Art: felle93a
